structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.catch_line: Appointment of deputy county judge/executive to serve during emergency.
law.text: In any county where no deputy county judge/executive has been appointed by the county judge/executive upon June 18, 1970, then the county judge/executive of such county shall appoint a deputy county judge/executive for the purpose of preparing for such an emergency as is set forth in KRS 67.730.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 488, effective January 2, 1978.
